modules.description: Provides functions to convert between ASCII strings and their hexadecimal representations, ensuring lossless transformation. Operates on standard OCaml strings, handling pairs of hex digits as byte values. Used to serialize binary data for text-based protocols or debug logging.

Converts hexadecimal strings to byte sequences and vice versa, handling whitespace skipping during decoding. Processes ASCII strings and byte arrays, supporting direct encoding into preallocated buffers. Outputs formatted hex dumps with optional row numbers and character representations.
